description: This file is a PHP web page that serves as an interface for viewing SIP Packet Log data in a network gateway configuration page. It includes HTML, PHP includes, CSS, and JavaScript for dynamic interaction, notably fetching and displaying log data via AJAX.

methods.name: document.ready
methods.description: Initializes page behavior when the DOM is fully loaded, including setting up click handlers for the 'REFRESH' button and configuring the AJAX call to load SIP Packet Log data.
